lines.text: The Cosmos, a universe of good and evil, where a small group struggles to bring freedom to the countless worlds of despair. A rag-tag band lead by the infamous Captain EO.
Don't panic! That's what got us into trouble the last time!
We've reached the homing beacon, sir.

Well, so far, so good, Captain EO. I must admit, I am a bit surprised after the mess you made out of your last mission. But now that you've found the beacon, take the map, find the Supreme Leader, and give her the gift. You do have the map, don't you?
No problem, sir. We've got it right here.
Boy, do we have a problem.
We'll never find a supreme leader without a map.
I told you I'd find her.
You infect my world with your presence! Turn the others into... trash cans!

[turns to leave]
See ya later, trashcans!
We have come here uninvited and unannounced.
So... then we both admit to your... stupidity! Why have you come?
To bring a gift, your highness. To someone as beautiful as you.
Very beautiful within, your highness, but without a key to unlock it, and that is my gift to you.
So... let me see this gift!
Not only see, your highness... but hear.
Sir, the ship is in no condition to go into battle. I thought we might start by cleaning Hooter's bunk.
Somebody get the map; where's the map?
Hooter, be quiet! You're going to get us killed!
[grabs some junk and puts it on him]
Hooter, listen, put it back and let's go.
Now listen, the command considers us a bunch of losers, but we're gonna do it right because we're the best. If not, we'll be drummed out of the corps.
